8_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body:
hi, I tried to view the stats page as mentioned in the doc @ 127.0.0.1:43110/stats/ , but it only gives me an empty page with only "Not found -  /stats" 
Is something wrong..?

> [nofish](#comment_1029_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): It's case-sensitive, so: http://127.0.0.1:43110/Stats

ah now it works, thanks a lot nofish ! i'm new to zeronet, not really used to case sensitive URLs ;)
